#include<stdio.h>
inline int read(){

	char c = getchar() ;
	int n = 0 ;

	while( c<48 || c>57 ) c = getchar() ;

	while( c>=48 && c<=57 ){
	
		n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + (c-48) ;
		c = getchar() ;
	}
	return n ;
}

int main(){

	int T , N ;
	
	T = read() ;

	while(T--){
	
		N = read() ;
		
		if(N&1)
			if(N%3)
				printf("NO\n") ;
			else
				printf("YES\n") ;
		else
			printf("YES\n") ;
	}
	return 0 ;
}
